recipes.label: Conversation: Knight & Soldier (Travel to Fort)
recipes.startdescription: "We should catch up more later. I haven't even told you about the archbishop." As the knight shows them to the extra horse, the soldier smiles to him: "You'll have plenty of time. Let's go now."
recipes.description: They rode through the town and the forest. The fort sits atop a hillock, with a drawbridge already down. The soldier's mouth hangs slightly open as they enter the fort.

recipes.label: Conversation: Scribe & Taverner
recipes.startdescription: One night, the taverner and the scribe are chatting in the private room of tavern.
recipes.description: "Are you writing to the Baron again?" "Yes, to congratulate them about the marriage." "They just got married? Thank god. Well, relay my congratulation to them too."

recipes.label: Conversation: Taverner & Arbitrator
recipes.startdescription: One afternoon, the taverner and the arbitrator are chatting in the tavern.
recipes.description: "Good lord! You heard that the tax for wine has increased a tenth?" "I have heard about it. Quite unfortunate."

recipes.label: Conversation: Scribe & Arbitrator
recipes.startdescription: One afternoon, the scribe and the arbitrator are chatting in the tavern.
recipes.description: "How was the sermon today?" "Quite good. It was given by the Vicar today." "The Vicar? Interesting."

recipes.label: Conversation: Knight & Soldier
recipes.startdescription: One morning, the knight and the soldier are discussing something in the training yard.
recipes.description: "My posture on horseback is still as bad as when I joined the army." "That's nonsense! You've improved quite a lot! Besides, you have never been really bad. You just needed more guidance."

recipes.label: Conversation: Doctor & Lord
recipes.startdescription: One morning, the knight and the soldier are discussing something in the training yard.
recipes.description: "It is a long ride for you to get here. You should get some rest." "No need for that. I brought some herbs. See any could be of use."

recipes.label: Conversation: Doctor & Prior
recipes.startdescription: One morning, the doctor and the prior are discussing something in the Doctor's tower.
recipes.description: "How was your progress with making gold?" "You remember. Not too well. I wasn't able to purify it." "Well, I guess even the alchemists in Paris wasn't good enough to do it." "No. No, they were not helpful at all."

recipes.label: Conversation: Scribe & Taverner
recipes.startdescription: One afternoon, the taverner and the scribe are chatting in the tavern.
recipes.description: "How's the fishing today?" "Pretty good. Sold some to the market and here's the rest." "What's that in your hand?" "This?" The scribe holds up the shining shell in their hand with a smirk, "a bonus."

recipes.label: Conversation: Taverner & Arbitrator
recipes.startdescription: One morning, the taverner and the arbitrator are chatting in the tavern.
recipes.description: "Do you plan to propose to the Scribe soon?" "Shhh...Don't let them hear about it! But yes, I've been thinking about it for a while. I don't know what the best time is."

recipes.label: Conversation: Scribe & Arbitrator

recipes.label: Conversation: Knight & Soldier
recipes.startdescription: One morning, the knight and the soldier are discussing something in the training yard.
recipes.description: "So, had you been a cook at the tavern ever since you left my troupe?" "Yes." "How have you found your life as a cook." "Decent. Just a little boring sometimes. Not as exciting as the life in the army."
